name: gold-southfield

procedures: T1027::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has executed base64 encoded PowerShell scripts on compromised hosts.
T1059.001::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has staged and executed PowerShell scripts on compromised hosts.
T1113::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has used the remote monitoring and management tool ConnectWise to obtain screen captures from victim's machines.
T1133::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has used publicly-accessible RDP and remote management and monitoring (RMM) servers to gain access to victim machines.
T1190::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has exploited Oracle WebLogic vulnerabilities for initial compromise.
T1195.002::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has distributed ransomware by backdooring software installers via a strategic web compromise of the site hosting Italian WinRAR.
T1199::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has breached Managed Service Providers (MSP's) to deliver malware to MSP customers.
T1219::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has used the cloud-based remote management and monitoring tool "ConnectWise Control" to deploy [REvil].
T1566::[GOLD SOUTHFIELD] has conducted malicious spam (malspam) campaigns to gain access to victim's machines.

description: [GOLD SOUTHFIELD](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0115) is a financially motivated threat group active since at least 2019 that operates the [REvil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0496) Ransomware-as-a Service (RaaS). [GOLD SOUTHFIELD](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0115) provides backend infrastructure for affiliates recruited on underground forums to perpetrate high value deployments.(Citation: Secureworks REvil September 2019)(Citation: Secureworks GandCrab and REvil September 2019)(Citation: Secureworks GOLD SOUTHFIELD)
